title: OSX for PCs
body: Why waste money on a Mac? <a href="http://www.wired.com/news/mac/0,2125,63456,00.html">OSX has been installed on PCs</a>.  Apparently its buggy and slow as hell â€” so it runs the same as it does on a Mac.  The fact that this is even possible and that someone actually did it, just shows the awesomeness of the PC's current hardware/software as well as the Windows OS it runs under.
bodyArticleHtml:
2004-05-17

OSX for PCs

Why waste money on a Mac?
